GSL Recruitment 2025 - Apply Offline for 02 Expert and Specialist Post
Prasanna / All Government Jobs / Aug 22, 2025, 09:34 IST
 Goa Shipyard Limited
 2 Jobs |  Posted On : 22-Aug-2025 |  Goa |  Salary : 50,000 to 50,000




FOLLOW

The Goa Shipyard (GSL) has announced the official notification for 2025. To fill up the vacancies for 02 Expert and Specialist Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the B.E/ B.Tech in Mechanical Engineering, Electrical Engineering can grab this chance and apply for these posts. Here we include the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for the GSL Recruitment 2025. Interested and eligible candidates can apply on or before the last date of application.




If you are looking for more, here is a list of Government Jobs in 2025 that you can all apply for. Use this link for more jobs in Goa

GSL Recruitment 2025  - Eligibility Criteria
Name of the Posts	No.of Vacancies	Qualification
Expert/ Specialist 	02	B.E/ B.Tech in Mechanical Engineering, Electrical Engineering

Age Limit for the GSL Recruitment 2025

The Minimum Age Limit: 21 years.
The Maximum Age Limit: 62 years.

Selection Process for the GSL Recruitment 2025

Interview

Salary Structure for the GSL Recruitment 2025

The Minimum Salary: Rs. 50,000 /- per month.

Application fee for the GSL Recruitment 2025

There is no application fee.
How to Apply for the GSL Recruitment 2025
Visit the official website.
Go to the recruitment or career page.
Check for the Expert and Specialist Jobs 2025.
Read the notification carefully.
Check the eligibility criteria.
If you meet the eligibility criteria.
Download the application form.
Fill out the application form carefully.
Then, send the application form to the address mentioned in the official notification.

Important Dates

Starting Date of Application	18-08-2025
Last Date of Application	05-09-2025

 

Official Notification and Application Form	Click Here
